APPINSIGHTS_INSTRUMENTATIONKEY: <<add instrumentation key for the app insights instance we will log to>>

AzureBlobStorage.PrimaryServiceUrl: <<add url for primary blob storage endpoint where files are stored>>
AzureBlobStorage.GeoRedundantServiceUrl: <<add url for secondary blob storage endpoint where files are stored>>

AzureAppConfiguration.PrimaryServiceUrl: <<add uri to the azure app configuration instance in the primary region if we can use a managed identity to authenticate>>
AzureAppConfiguration.GeoRedundantServiceUrl: <<add uri to the azure app configuration instance in the failover region if we can use a managed identity to authenticate>>
